meanings.sent1: The kirtled lady looked elegant in her traditional dress.
meanings.sent2: She always felt comfortable in her kirtled attire.
meanings.sent3: The kirtled dancer twirled gracefully on the stage.
meanings.sent4: The kirtled trees seemed to dance in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The kirtled fabric swirled around her as she moved.

meanings.definition: Covered or surrounded by a kirtle.
meanings.sent1: The kirtled table was beautifully decorated for the feast.
meanings.sent2: The garden was kirtled with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent3: The kirtled cake was the centerpiece of the party.
meanings.sent4: The kirtled hills embraced the quaint village.
meanings.sent5: The kirtled walls of the castle provided protection.
